attributes.action: Scrap the Proposals for a North East Super Council
attributes.additional_details: The proposal for a North East super council comprising of County Durham, Northumberland and, Tyne and Wear, will leave rural areas such as Teesdale in County Durham marginalised as there will be a greater focus on the urban areas of Newcastle, Durham, Gateshead and Sunderland, with areas such as Teesdale essentially forgotten about. As such, this proposal should be consigned to history.
